sentences.en: ...a full-service restaurant equipped to cater large events.
sentences.cn: …一家承办大型活动及提供全方位服务的饭店。
他也承办派对的饮食吗？

sentences.en: Does the school cater for all abilities?
sentences.cn: 学校能够做到因材施教吗？

sentences.en: Exercise classes cater to all levels of fitness.
sentences.cn: 各种健身班会照顾到不同身体状况的人。

sentences.en: Felix Babylon had set himself to cater specially for Royalty.
sentences.cn: 费利克斯?巴比伦尽力满足王室成员的需要.

sentences.en: I expect he will be able to cater for your particular needs.
sentences.cn: 我预计他能满足你的特殊需要.

sentences.en: Its tariffs cater for four basic classifications of customer.
sentences.cn: 它的价目表适合4个基本类别的顾客。

sentences.en: Most schools cater for children of different abilities.
sentences.cn: 大多数学校能够满足具有不同天资的儿童的需要.

sentences.en: Nunsmere Hall can cater for receptions of up to 300 people.
sentences.cn: 纳恩斯米尔酒店最多可以同时接待300人。

sentences.en: Special bus and rail services are being laid on to cater for the crowds.
sentences.cn: 正在安排专门的巴士和铁路交通服务以满足群众的需要。

sentences.en: The chef is pleased to cater for vegetarian diets.
sentences.cn: 厨师非常乐意为客人做素食。

sentences.en: The club was constituted to  cater the young's taste.
sentences.cn: 这个俱乐部是为满足年轻人品位而设立的。

sentences.en: The hospital will cater only for emergencies.
The low tastes just cater his needs.
sentences.cn: 这些低级趣味正从其所好.

sentences.en: This is the biggest event we’ve ever catered for.
sentences.cn: 这是由我们提供承办宴席的最大一次活动。

sentences.en: We cater to an exclusive clientele.
sentences.cn: 我们只接待特定的高端客户。

sentences.en: We have to cater for demand.

words.tran_cn: 备办食物者；承办酒席的人；筹备人
给养；承办酒席；提供饮食及服务

phrases.tran_cn: 迎合；供应伙食；为…提供所需

trans.tran_cn: 满足…的需要，接待，考虑到，提供饮食，承办酒席
trans.tran_en: to provide and serve food and drinks at a party, meeting etc, usually as a business

trans.tran_cn: 满足需要， 迎合； 提供饮食及服务， 承办酒席
trans.tran_en: to provide and serve food and drinks at a party, meeting etc, usually as a business
